source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Let's Meditate with Mandala
items.headline: Allow your mind and body to wander in the art and beauty of mandala!
objectives_summary: Basic shapes in a mandala
Understanding the significance of colors in madala
Doodling and mandala in defined shapes

items.title: Back In The Saddle Again
items.headline: The Joy of Acrylic Painting with Frosty Rankin III
objectives_summary: New methods and tricks of the practices of an acrylic artist

items.title: Fun Activities for Kids on a Budget
items.headline: New and fun ways to keep your kids busy on a budget
objectives_summary: Implement easy and low cost ways to keep your children busy
See their children engaged and having fun
Generate a list of activities for future use

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Waterton Lakes

visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.

items.title: DIY - Learn to Repair your Clothes by Hand

visible_instructors.title: Léonie Daignault-Leclerc
visible_instructors.name: Léonie
visible_instructors.job_title: Designer et fondatrice de Gaia & Dubos

items.headline: Learn the basics of clothes mending and don't ever pay a seamstress again!
objectives_summary: You will learn to mend your clothes yourself! You won't have to pay a seamstress ever again, plus, your clothes will last longer!

items.title: Beginner Book Folding
items.headline: Upcycling from average everyday book to beautiful work of art
objectives_summary: How to fold the pages of a book into designs

items.title: Chapter Two of Chinese Tea Art Micro-course: Green Tea 绿茶篇

visible_instructors.job_title: Tea Master, Tea Coach, Pu-erh Tea Specialist, Sommelier
visible_instructors.title: Mabol Discover Cha
visible_instructors.name: Mabol

items.headline: The Foundation to Apprciate Tea Ceremony
objectives_summary: The Original of Green Tea 绿茶的起源
The Processing of Green tea 绿茶的工艺
What is Fixation 什么是杀青

items.title: Bee Creative with Alcohol Inks
items.headline: Alcohol Ink painting techniques and projects on yupo paper for beginners and up!
objectives_summary: How to use Alcohol inks to create a beautiful Bee and Flower painting.
Students will have plenty of practice lectures to create, draw, test, and experiment.
We will complete basic projects then move on to a more detailed coneflower painting.

items.title: How to paint realistic food in watercolor
items.headline: Create Realistic Painting
objectives_summary: Basic  Watercolor and Sketch Techniques
What Art Materials to Use
Color Theory

items.title: Oil Painting on Canvas - French Master Painter Technics

visible_instructors.title: Stanislas Kostka
visible_instructors.name: Stanislas
visible_instructors.job_title: French master painter former Salavador Dali student.

items.headline: Former student of Salvador Dali. French Master Painter teaching his secrets of this amazing modern painting.
objectives_summary: How to paint with oil on canvas from the European master who is a former student of Salvador Dali.

items.title: Paint Birds in Watercolor: step by step tutorial
items.headline: Learn mixed watercolor technique while painting cute birds
objectives_summary: How to use mixed watercolor technique in one painting
How to work wet-on-wet and in glazing techniques
How to create realistic feathers, eyes, beaks, wings of birds

items.title: How To Paint in Watercolour a Realistic, Cute Harvest Mouse!
items.headline: Learn how to paint realistic looking fur, a cute little mouse and let's get botanical with some wheat for it to sit on!
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint a detailed, realistic Harvest Mouse on wheat from start to finish, using various watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this cute fury mouse in fine detailed and all in watercolour.
Botanical wheat painting

items.title: MADHUBANI WATERCOLOR PAINTING | ChitraRang Fine Art Academy

items.headline: Online Art Courses for all age groups
objectives_summary: Beautiful PEACOCK AND FISH MADHUBANI Masterpiece Painting
Step by Step detailed DIY Video for self learning
Watercolor Painting

items.title: Make A Chunky Knit Wool Blanket In Less Than 45 Minutes
items.headline: Step by step instructions to help you master arm knitting in less than 1 hour
objectives_summary: How create a perfect chunky knit blanket in 45 minutes even if you're clueless
How to make perfect sized stitches without using your arms
How to cast on

items.title: Modern Folk Art: Drawing and Painting fish
items.headline: Let's create our own fish forms and make colorful paintings with a folk art touch!
objectives_summary: Learn to paint modern folk art paintings using gouache/your favorite medium.
Understand a basic anatomy of fish.
learn to make your own folk art fish forms with a modern touch.

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Lavender fields in Provence - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Let's create Provence view with the lavender field, small houses in the middle ground and beautiful mountains there far!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, use of special brushes
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing
